ineligibleContent.messageContent:
This grant is for businesses who:
  • are agricultural, horticultural or forestry producers (primary producers)
  • provide processing services to a primary producer
  • are a separate processing business owned by a primary producer

messageLink.title: See other grants you may be eligible for.

validate.error: Select the option that applies to your business

content.para: This grant is for businesses who:
items: are agricultural, horticultural or forestry producers (primary producers)
provide processing services to a primary producer
are a separate processing business owned by a primary producer

answers.value: A grower or producer of agricultural, horticultural or forestry agri-products (a primary producer)

hint.text: For example, arable or livestock farmer, growing trees, fruit producer, salad grower

answers.value: Providing processing services to a primary producer

hint.text: For example, vegetable washing, mobile livestock slaughter services

answers.value: A separate processing business owned by a primary producer

hint.text: For example, cheese processing business owned by a dairy farmer
